article_title: Health Savings Accounts Are For The Poor And The Sick

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: A Health Savings Account is a store of cash that allows you to pay medical expenses not paid by health insurance. Critics have said for years that these accounts only benefit the healthy and the wealthy. They have it exactly backwards. My colleagues at the National Center for Policy Analysis and [...]
